name: ccb_crossrepo - Cross-Repository Challenges
description: Tasks requiring analysis and modification across multiple repositories. Includes cross-repo API migration (gRPC across Go repos), bug localization (NumPy/pandas/scikit-learn data flow), cross-file reasoning (Kubernetes CRI to containerd), and cross-repo refactoring (HTTP classes across Django/Flask/requests).
notes: Requires harbor-ccb_crossrepo:base Docker image built from base/ directory. Each task spans 2-3 repositories from the 10Figure-Codebases corpus.
